Page Contents

    Documentation Updates

    Below are recent documentation updates.

    27-August-2021

    New Docs

    • Title: Data Sent to Analytics by the Brightcove Player
    • Description: This topic provides a list of all data sent by the Brightcove Player to the Analytics system.
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/analytics/general/data-sent-from-brightcove-player.html
    • Category: Analytics, Data Collection

    Major updates

    • Title: Brightcove Social™ Documentation
    • Description: All Brightcove Social™ documentation has been updated using the new Brightcove branding
    • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/social/index.html
    • Category: Brightcove Social™ Documentation
    • Title: Overview: Playback API
    • Description: Maximum videos per playlist increased to 1000. Also added information about how to retrieve videos for a playlist when there are more than 100
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/playback/getting-started/overview-playback-api.html#Playlist_requests
    • Category: Playback API, Playlists
    • Title: Playback API Reference
    • Description: Maximum videos per limit parameter increased to 1000. Applies to general video and playlist videos requests
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/playback/references/reference_v1.html#operation/Get_Playlists_by_ID_or_Reference_ID
    • Category: Playback API, Playlists
    • Title: Uploading Videos Using the Upload Module
    • Description: Warning that video cannot currently be uploaded from dropbox - this is a bug introduced by a change in Dropbox, and a fix is in the works
    • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/media/uploading-videos-using-upload-module.html
    • Category: Ingesting Videos
    • Title: Uploading Videos Using Remote URLs
    • Description: Warning that video cannot currently be uploaded from dropbox - this is a bug introduced by a change in Dropbox, and a fix is in the works
    • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/media/uploading-videos-remote-urls.html
    • Category: Ingesting Videos
    • Title: Debugging on Mobile Devices
    • Description: Updated all sections for working with Android devices
    • Link: https://general.support.brightcove.com/developer/debugging-mobile-devices.html
    • Category: General developer
    • Title: Social Sharing Plugin
    • Description: Updated the options section based on engineering notes
    • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/plugins/social-sharing-plugin.html#Options
    • Category: Brightcove Player
    • Title: Live DRM
    • Description: Update stream format table for Widevine DRM.
    • Link: https://live.support.brightcove.com/general/live-drm.html
    • Category: Live

    Minor updates

    • Title: Known Issues
    • Description: Updated issue where player does not function correctly if there is an element on the page with the id "default"
    • Link: https://general.support.brightcove.com/support/known-issues-studio-brightcove-player-and-apis.html#player
    • Category: Brightcove Player
    • Title: Implementing Client-Side Ads with the Native SDKs
    • Description: Apple will deny any App Store "Kids" category submission using the IMA SDK
    • Link: https://sdks.support.brightcove.com/features/implementing-client-side-ads-native-sdks.html#iOS_Implementation
    • Category: Native SDKs

    20-August-2021

    New Docs

    • Title: Using Multi-Lingual Metadata
    • Description: In this topic you will learn how to use multi-lingual video metadata in a Portal Experience
    • Link: https://gallery.support.brightcove.com/experiences/portal/using-multi-lingual-metadata.html
    • Category: Gallery

    Major updates

    • Title: Brightcove Native Player Controls
    • Description: Added section about adding fast forward and rewind buttons
    • Link: https://sdks.support.brightcove.com/features/brightcove-native-player-controls.html#Jump_forward_and_rewind_buttons
    • Category: Native SDKs
    • Title: Debugging on Mobile Devices
    • Description: Updated steps and images for Android debugging section
    • Link: https://general.support.brightcove.com/developer/debugging-mobile-devices.html#Android_debugging
    • Category: General developer
    • Title: Managing Playlists Using the CMS API
    • Description: Maximum videos per playlist increased to 1000. Also added information about how to retrieve videos for a playlist when there are more than 100
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/cms/managing-videos/managing-playlists-using-cms-api.html
    • Category: CMS API, Playlists
    • Title: CMS API Reference
    • Description: Maximum videos per playlist increased to 1000. Also new limit and offset params for Get Videos in Playlist request
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/cms/references/reference.html#operation/GetVideosInPlaylist
    • Category: CMS API, Playlists
    • Title: Overview: Forensic Watermarking
    • Description: HEVC, Mixed-codec video, and 5.1 Audio now supported
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/general/overview-forensic-watermarking.html#related_topics
    • Category: Dynamic Ingest, Uplaod Module, Forensic Watermarking

    Minor updates

    • Title: Cross-Device Resume with the Native SDKs
    • Description: Updated overview text to include same or different device
    • Link: https://sdks.support.brightcove.com/features/cross-device-resume-sdks.html
    • Category: Native SDKs
    • Title: Cross-Device Resume with Brightcove Player
    • Description: Updated overview text to include same or different device
    • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/playback/xdr-with-bcplayer.html
    • Category: Brightcove Player
    • Title: Overview: Cross-Device Resume
    • Description: Updated overview text to include same or different device
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/xdr/getting-started/xdr-overview.html
    • Category: XDR API
    • Title: Tealium Plugin for Brightcove Player
    • Description: Added text to emphasize that Tealium if not platform-specific
    • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/plugins/tealium-plugin-brightcove-player.html
    • Category: Brightcove Player
    • Title: Encoding Settings: Watermarks
    • Description: Removed GIF from supported formats (no longer is)
    • Link: https://zencoder.support.brightcove.com/encoding-settings/assets/encoding-settings-watermarks.html
    • Category: Zencoder
    • Title: Overview: Analytics API
    • Description: Added note that subsequent identical requests will return a 409 error until the initial request has be processed and the response cached
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/analytics/getting-started/overview-analytics-api-v1.html#Caching
    • Category: Analytics API
    • Title: Editing Video Properties using the Media Module
    • Description: Added screenshot to show where forensic watermarking shows up in video properties
    • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/media/editing-video-properties-using-media-module.html
    • Category: Media Module, Forensic Watermarking
    • Title: Live DRM
    • Description: Removed references to Internet Explorer
    • Link: https://live.support.brightcove.com/general/live-drm.html#Playback_technologies_used
    • Category: Live
    • Title: Working with Folders
    • Description: Added note that accounts are limited to 1000 folders
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/cms/managing-videos/cms-api-working-folders.html
    • Category: CMS API, Folders
    • Title: CMS API Reference
    • Description: Added limit of 1000 folders, missing error code for folder limit exceeded
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/cms/references/reference.html#operation/CreateFolder
    • Category: CMS API, Folders
    • Title: Live API: Insert ID3 timed metadata
    • Description: Added a note in the ID3 doc for the TS stream timestamps.
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/live-api/guides/live-api-insert-id3-timed-metadata.html
    • Category: Live, API
    • Title: Creating Social Media Publishing Destinations
    • Description: Added a YouTube warning for hidden channels.
    • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/social/creating-social-media-publishing-destinations.html#youtube
    • Category: Social
